Title: Arslan Senki (TV): Tsuioku no Shou - Dakkan no Yaiba
Description: [Arslan Senki (TV): Dakkan no Yaiba, " retells the events of the series' first 13 episodes, summarizing the events that transpired from Arslan's escape with Daryun, to their time in the Peshawar Citadel."]
Voices: ['Kobayashi, Yuusuke', 'Hosoya, Yoshimasa', 'Namikawa, Daisuke', 'KENN', 'Sakamoto, Maaya', 'Kaji, Yuki', 'Hanae, Natsuki', 'Uchiyama, Yumi', 'Sugou, Takayuki', 'Numakura, Manami']
Staff: [['Abe, Noriyuki', 'Director'], ['Aketagawa, Jin', 'Sound Director'], ['Kajiura, Yuki', 'Theme Song Lyrics, Theme Song Composition, Theme Song Arrangement'], ['Kalafina', 'Theme Song Performance']]
